message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $180.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, $120 is a bit lower than I was hoping for. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I can offer it to you for $160.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit far from my budget. Would you be willing to consider $140?
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I can offer it to you for $165.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to consider $145?
I understand you're trying to be responsible with your budget, Bob. I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $155.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still trying to get as close to my budget as possible. Would you be willing to consider $150?
